tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: It was a great experience consulting Dr. Anjali Bapat as she explained me the root of my problem and suggested various natural remedies to cure the same. She also suggested a change in lifestyle that is necessary to live a healthy life. I would definitely recommend her if you don't want to rely on antibiotic medicines and treat your health issues with natural remedies.
reply_text: Thank u Nupura and wish u good health .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I started consultation with Dr. Anjali Bapat in  pre-pregnancy time with the aim to conceive naturally.One of the other doctor who I visited before, suggested the drilling treatment for ovaries in order to conceive, at the very starting. However, Anjali Ma'am guided that we should go through conceiving process level by level, first step being to conceive by natural process. She also explained the things with related body functions along with diagrams in great detail.Throughout the pregnancy she was very very supportive, always available on call and whatsapp any time and so many times acted as psychological cum emotional counseller for me. She has always guided for taking simple, nutritious and homemade foods, which has helped a lot during pregnancy.Just before delivery, she did my emotional counselling and unlike others waited for almost 12 hrs for my normal delivery. After that, I delivered a healthy baby boy.She has given all kind of possible support in the most important time of my life and helped me with delivering a healthy baby boy.For me, I would not have got a better doctor and a better person in this beautiful process of motherhood.
reply_text: God bless you all. Enjoy parenthood and lots of love to little one :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I visited Dr. Anjali  for treatment of some infection in my genitals till then I was not aware of the term Herpes . The best thing which I liked about her was her friendliness & responsiveness. I felt like I was talking to my friend and I was very comfortable in telling my problems .Meeting Dr. Anjali was very soothing & pleasant . Patiently she checked up and explained the issue to me  . I  will highly recommend Dr.  Anjali . Sometimes we just meet Doctor and get better. She has that magic in her . Just loved the experience.
reply_text: Farah , thank u for yr appreciative words promptly expressed. Wish u all the best for everything in yr life. Take care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My wife and myself  were newly expecting parents, With our first visit we were confident and relief that we found right person for our 1st pregnancy journey, Madam was very patient, kind and always available for all our concerns and queries. She has an excellent team of her medical practitioners with her and my wife delivered healthy baby boy with her guidance. I would recommend Anjali madam for any one looking for pregnancy related concerns or very good mid mid wife who will always be there with all her/his yrs of experience in this critical period for expecting parents . Thanks a lot madam once again for all the things.
reply_text: Thank u üôè

tags: None
review: Word of caution - I, like many of my friends, did not have the courage to proceed beyond the first consultation. * ** ******* **** ****** ***** * **** **** ****** **** *********** ** ** ** ***** ******** ******* ** *****  Our negative experience is related to complete insensitivity by the doctor covered across the spectrum including diagnosis, prognosis and even plain consultation.  All of us had left the room in tears believing the most negative outcome and that there was nothing better possible. If you feel pressured into a line of treatment that is very hard for you to accept (tight hug), please do ask if there is any risk in deferring it. Please do find the strength and courage to get multiple opinions; I went through 4 before I arrived at one that suited me, each being better than the previous one (dr Bapat was my first). In my experience, several positive details emerged as I proceeded, whereas Dr Bapats consultation was extremely comprehensive on the negative case scenario list (my friends' experience has been the same). She is very well versed with insurance procedures and documentation! If you do not find yourself getting anxiety attacks and crying continuously, you have moved past our stage and can then seek reviews on the technical bit.  All the best in your journey, tight hug, lots of love, luck and remember.. you got this! üòä
reply_text: Good luck to you .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: It is rare to find a doctor who is so diligent about making the patient understand the roots of the issue and advise the appropriate action to treat it. And Dr. Anjali is one among such. She could have easily prescribed a few medicines to help me treat the issue temporarily, but she took the effort to make us understand the problem in great detail and suggested us the right approach to deal with this issue, which would be helpful for lifetime and not just temporarily. I've never met a doctor like her before, with a Very holistic approach, and i am very glad to have consulted Dr.Anjali. Highly recommended.
reply_text: Neha it was my pleasure helping both of u. I wish u all the very best in life. üôè

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: During Covid time, my wife was having irritation in the vagina. Based upon the reviews by other patient, i visited the doctor. ******** ****** *** ***** ***** *** ****** ******* **** ******* ** **** **** **** ** ** ***** prescribed medicine citing it as a normal infection. Since the problem was not diagnosed, we again visited the doctor but still she was reluctant to see the vagina of my wife. On request, she inspected my wife and give a medicine. We completed the course, however my wife vagina got so swollen and there was a drastic weight gain of my wife. We are so helpless *** *** ** **** ****** ********** *** **** ** *********** ****** *** ******** We request everyone to please avoid this doctor.
reply_text:
Sorry for deday in reply... as I wanted to check my records regarding your wife. Yes... your wife had come to me for first time on 16 th June 2020 and follow up on 2 nd July 2020. She has a condition called Vaginismus ... due to which internal examination is often not possible due to pain and was not done ( she was reluctant). As I remember... i had explained this to her in details and had told her that she will need treatment for Vaginismus... but she did not come later on. 

Drastic weight gain does not happen due to any vaginal condition.  

Its unfortunate that you did not follow up... 

I wish both of you good luck.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Maternal Care/ Checkup,Caesarean Section (C Section),Complicated Pregnancy Treatment,
review: I have been going to Dr. Anjali Bapat for about 2.5 years now. Started at a time when there was a complication in my pregnancy. She is extremely professional, accurate in her diagnosis, explains things very clearly, calm in her demeanor and approachable at any point of time. She was a great support for me during my delivery, especially as it was during the lockdown and Covid-19 times. Throughout the time, she was always reachable for any doubts and references and lent a sense of reassurance at times of tension. Would highly recommend her.
reply_text: Thank u dear. Whats the name of yr little one ? Good luck and blessings.  Take care üòÄ

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: It has almost been two years since I suffered from UTI. First few days were very painful. It was on persistence of the issue that my son found Dr. Anjali on practo. When we visited her we were not aware of the issue, but she recommended the right tests to diagnose it. Not only was she patient enough to hear the issue but also made herself available on whatsapp to answer my queries after the treatment. I was free from UTI after that and till today haven‚Äôt faced that trouble yet. Special thanks to your caring approach Dr. Anjali. Definitely recommend!
reply_text: Yr appreciative words mean a lot to me. Take care :)

review: I had been to Dr Anjali 6 years back for UTI and ever since I have stuck to her. She handled both of my pregnancies. As a patient I have been excessively scared of injections and physical pain and many of the doctors I had visited before had never empathized with my fear. But Dr Anjali had always been more assuring and ensuring that my physical discomfort was minimum. She gives enough time to clear things about any health issue. I would recommend this Dr to every woman who wants the correct advice for their condition.
reply_text: Thank u Soumya for your appreciative words.  It was indeed my pleasure to get associated with a gentle person like u. Wish u only the best in life. üòä

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review:
Our experience with Dr. Anjali Jitendra Bapat is really wonderful. Dr. Anjali Jitendra Bapat is a great Doctor. *** ********* ** *** ******* ** *********** Me and my wife started consulting Dr.Anjali from February 2018. We were new to Mumbai and we got know about her from Practo. This being first pregnancy, we were clueless. we were happy as well as well as confused about the future. Our first visit to Dr Bapat was more than satisfactory. Dr.Bapat treated my wife  as being close relative and neatly explained all details regarding the further periods of pregnancy that helped us taking further decisions. She clarified all our doubts and we are great full for her advises. Consulting timings were convenient and adjustable. At some anxiety moments we even contacted her at late nights. 
We are very much thankful to her and would love to recommend her for the consulation

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I would highly recommend Dr. Anjali Bapat. I had a smooth stress free pregnancy all thanks to her. I used to visit the doctor at her Mahim clinic which is the closest from my place. She always insisted on taking prior appointment and I never had to wait. I delivered my baby at Khar Hinduja which was also recommended by her for which I am always grateful. I am utmost satisfied with the treatment. Though I had PCOD, I conceived naturally and delivered without a single problem throughout. She is very friendly and takes care of the patient like her family. She would explain each and everything in a very simplified manner which boosts your confidence in the doctor. Our monthly consultations used to go on for hours ensuring we were completely informed of all what's and how's of pregnancy. It was a delightful experience with Dr. Bapat. :)
reply_text: Thank u Mugdha for your kind wods üòä

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We are new to Mumbai and came to know about the Doctor through a referral. It was such a wonderful experience. It was an emergency situation on a week end and though late in the night, she met us and put me on the right track of medication. The Doctor was very friendly, caring and her diagnosis was spot on and I felt so relieved within 24 hours. I really wish, I could have met her earlier.My anxiety about,my health on the particular issue is totally off. I would very strongly recommend this doctor for all gynecology related  problems.
reply_text: Thank u Sujatha... for your appreciative words :)

review: Dr. Anjali Bapat made the whole pregnancy Journey very smooth. Right from first Sonography to the delivery, every stage was discussed in very minute detail possible with a heads-up of what lies ahead. She was available 24*7 all throughout. She has a great team of doctors by her side too. She was very clear in explaining pregnancy is not a disease or any pathological disorder and should be handled with as much positivity as possible and should be thoroughly enjoyed and I did just the same under her able guidance. I have and will always recommend her to anyone who needs to visit a gynaecologist. Completely content with her guidance.
reply_text: Thank u dear. Lots of lv and blessings 2 u all üòä

Dr.Anjali has all that need to be a super doctor.  *** ** ****** ***** *********. Great human beings, take care of patient like her own child. She took every query with importance and responded to our utmost satisfaction. A down to earth lady. Today I visited her clinic first time. My 50% of stress & illness vanished away when I started to talk to her, she is so humble & listen to patient with passions.
She was very supportive, and thorough when explaining the process. She is a professional and has a naturally lovely personality. I have been pleased with your professional, yet personable service mam. Its been a tremendous experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr Anjali Bapat is phenomenal! I was to have a fibroid removal surgery with another top gynac but just two days before my surgery I didn‚Äôt have any confidence as that doctor wasn‚Äôt responding to my queries. 

I visited doctor Anjali for a second opinion and didn‚Äôt tell her I had met with another doctor and was due for surgery in less than 48 hours. I wanted an unbiased opinion from her, and she spoke to me and my husband in such detail about my situation that even a child would understand. She drew diagrams, told me that if I went in for surgery what would it be like and explained every minute detail of the post operative care. I left the clinic hoping that she would have been my gynac. 

I took a chance and called her at 10:30 pm on Monday night and explained the whole situation to her and asked if she would do my surgery and within half an hour at that point in the night she had everything arranged for me and that too for the same surgery date and within 48 hours I was able to  continue with my surgery with a doctor I was more confident with. Throughout the pre and post operative care she was just a message away. Always prompt to respond and always so caring. 

If you have a good doctor, half your battle is won. Dr Anjali is someone who really cares for her patients and there were multiple times I just felt so good that I made that decision to swap to her. 


The whole journey
reply_text:
So kind of u 2 share yr entire story.

I am happy to help u in yr short stay here. 

Wish u all the best for yr further journey. 
I am sure everything is going 2 b just fine.
Tk care. Good luck once again üëç

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Anjali Bapat, had a major role in helping me to  be firm and go ahead with Removal of my 9 cm Fibroid and almost 1-3 cm Cyst through Laparoscopic Myomectomy with Hysteroscopy Polypectomy.

I have been married for 3yrs and unable to conceive.
I live in Dubai, and was referred to her by a Family Friend.

Upon Ultrasound, i discovered bulky Fibroid and Cyst being a concern to get pregnant.

Dr. Anjali, has well explained the treatment, procedures from Pre to Post Op, regularly in touch with me while I was consulting her from Dubai on whatsapp, answered each and every question I had with patience, even the most silly queries with a smile. 

She took care of my 1st face to face consultation by fixing an appointment herself while I was still in dubai and ready to travel to Mumbai for the Surgery.

Dr. Anjali is Extremely caring, provided me all contact numbers / email address of hospital for Insurance Claims before hand to avoid any future hiccups by my Insurance Company in Dubai.

She gave me all necessary documents required before discharge and helped me in every way possible to make things smooth and comfortable.


I have never come across such a Doctor, who would look after you so beautifully.

Surgery has been successful and I am happy that I chose her.

Thank you Dr. Anjali, I'm glad I chose you üòä

Regards
Pooja
reply_text: Thank u so much for yr appreciation.  All is going to be well. Take care üòÄ

context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy Check Up,
review:
We went to Dr. Anjali Bapat as we were planning for a baby. Inspite of all the test results being normal we were not able to concieve. 

Doctor explained us the entire process in detail and patiently answered all our questions. She gave us proper time in each of her consultations which was most important for us. Timely tests and accurate medications advised by the doctor were very useful.

On occassions I had called her in the middle of the night and she was always available to answer my queries and even check for any issues with my health. She was available the entire time during my labour and delivery.

Thanks to the positive and comforting attitude along with expert medical advise of Dr. Anjali Bapat, I could go through the 9 months of pregnancy and the delivery with ease.
reply_text: Cm for next one sooon :)

Secondly when it came to technical talk, the way she explained all the scientific things which any normal layman person can understand was the best part... review:
Would like to appreciate her hand holding, counciling and clinical experience which helped my wife to diliver in normal way.
Just to share the experience, she had already made us aware of the complications which might take place at the time of dilivery and would appriciate the backup plan which she had kept ready to deal with.
My wife was told to diliver in normal way rather than opting for c section which we had planned..
My wife was insisting for c section but she made us wait ( one hour)and that wait resulted in normal dilivery .just to compare no doctor in current situation would have shown such patience and dilivered in normal way....

My wife and baby both are safe and healthy ... would thank her for the efforts which she has taken and also thanks to dr Meena mahamulkar who has referred me to her.
